mapper.select: SELECT BIZ_SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , LEVEL_NO , NAME , DESCRIPTION , SYS_CODE , ORDER_NO , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DT , MOD_ID , MOD_DT FROM TB_BIZ_CODE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY LEVEL_NO, ORDER_NO
SELECT BIZ_SEQ , PARENT_SEQ , LEVEL_NO , NAME , DESCRIPTION , SYS_CODE , ORDER_NO , DEL_YN , REG_ID , REG_DT , MOD_ID , MOD_DT FROM TB_BIZ_CODE WHERE BIZ_SEQ = #{bizSeq}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TB_BIZ_CODE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MOD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE BIZ_SEQ = #{bizSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BIZ_CODE WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{bizSeq} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.BIZ_SEQ , A.NAME AS DOMAIN_NAME , B.NAME AS GROUP_NAME , C.NAME AS SYSTEM_NAME , C.SYS_CODE , C.DESCRIPTION FROM TB_BIZ_CODE C JOIN TB_BIZ_CODE B ON C.PARENT_SEQ = B.BIZ_SEQ JOIN TB_BIZ_CODE A ON B.PARENT_SEQ = A.BIZ_SEQ WHERE C.LEVEL_NO = 3 AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO, B.ORDER_NO, C.ORDER_NO
